  • Method Details

    • getVehicleById

      Vehicle getVehicleById(int vehicleId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, VehicleNotFoundException
      Retrieves a vehicle based on the provided vehicle ID.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The ID of the vehicle to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The vehicle object corresponding to the ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.
      VehicleNotFoundException - If the requested vehicle is not found in the system.

    • getAvailableVehicles

      List<Vehicle> getAvailableVehicles() throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Retrieves the list of available vehicles.
      Returns:
      The list of available vehicles.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.

    • addVehicle

      void addVehicle(Vehicle vehicle) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException
      Adds a new vehicle to the system.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The vehicle object to add.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.

    • updateVehicle

      boolean updateVehicle(int vehicleId, Float dailyRate) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, VehicleNotFoundException
      Updates the daily rate of a vehicle based on the provided vehicle ID.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The ID of the vehicle to update.
      dailyRate - The new daily rate for the vehicle.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.
      VehicleNotFoundException - If the requested vehicle is not found in the system.

    • removeVehicle

      void removeVehicle(int vehicleId) throws SQLException, DatabaseConnectionException, VehicleNotFoundException
      Removes a vehicle from the system based on the provided vehicle ID.
      Parameters:
      vehicleId - The ID of the vehicle to remove.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the process.
      DatabaseConnectionException - If a database connection exception occurs during the process.
      VehicleNotFoundException - If the requested vehicle is not found in the system.

    • fetchAllVehicles

      void fetchAllVehicles()
      Fetches and displays all vehicles in the system.
